header.mainTitle: Moments May Pass, But Their Stories Last Forever
header.subtitle: Make every special occasion truly memorable with timeless and high quality visual documentation from Yogzan, proudly from Indonesia and available worldwide.

gallery.label: Moments
gallery.description: Whatever the moment, every story you tell always carries meaning!

Wisuda.label: Graduation
Wisuda.title: Congratulations, you finally graduated!
Wisuda.text: Graduation is proof of your hard work over the past years. Celebrate with family, friends, and colleagues. Yogzan will help capture every moment of your graduation day for you to remember.

Pernikahan.label: Wedding
Pernikahan.title: Congratulations and happiness to you and your partner!
Pernikahan.text: Make your sacred vow even more special with the best documentation you can get. Cherish love, laughter, and happy tears on your special day.

Wedding | Pre-Wedding.label: Wedding | Pre-Wedding
Wedding | Pre-Wedding.title: Congratulations and happiness to you and your partner!
Wedding | Pre-Wedding.text: Make your sacred vow even more special with the best documentation you can get. Cherish love, laughter, and happy tears on your special day.

Keluarga.label: Family
Keluarga.title: Every love starts from family!
Keluarga.text: Capture every happy event in your family, such as expecting a baby, birthdays, holidays together, and family member portraits.

Cetak Album.label: Album Printing
Cetak Album.title: Preserve Your Memories in a Beautiful Album
Cetak Album.text: Transform your photos into a stunning album that you can cherish forever. Our album printing service offers high-quality materials and designs to make your memories last.

whyUs.title: Entrust Every Moment to Us
whyUs.desc: Your milestones deserve more than just photos. They deserve to be remembered beautifully. At Yogzan, we treat your moments as our own, capturing them with passion and precision. Discover six reasons why we are your perfect choice.

testimonials.title: What They Say
testimonials.desc: Each of them is special, and so are you!

chooseUs.title: Signature Editing
chooseUs.desc: More than just applying a filter. We fine-tune every color in detail to create a final result that is both aesthetic and uniquely Yogzan.

chooseUs.title: Wide Coverage

chooseUs.title: Experienced Team
chooseUs.desc: Through a careful selection process, our team is composed of highly experienced professionals who are the best in their field.

chooseUs.title: Complete Packages
chooseUs.desc: From photos only to a full package with an album and video. Everything is integrated into one convenient service.

chooseUs.title: Trusted
chooseUs.desc: Since 2017, tens of thousands of clients from hundreds have trusted Yogzan to capture their most important moments.

chooseUs.title: Pose Guidance
chooseUs.desc: Feeling awkward in front of the camera? We will guide you to bring out your best look.
